name: Fireball Dodge
description:
Controls

WASD / Arrows - Move

Left Click / Left Ctrl - Shoot

Space - Dash to the Direction You're Holding

P - Pause

R - Restart level

Esc - Quit

Description

There are enemies you must kill with your fireballs, but every fireball you shoot will teleport to the other side and travel in a random direction once it reaches the edge. Once it teleports, it can only affect YOU. Dash to avoid incoming fireballs. When you dash, you will be invincible for half a second. Every few seconds a water bucket spawns. You can pick it up to shoot a waterball. Waterballs are bigger, faster, and can go through anything, but they only destroy fireballs and only exist for a short while. Make sure no enemies leave the screen, otherwise the level restarts. Kill the enemies to move to the next level!
